snippet: The S.E.C. says that three founders of a Minnesota-based software firm took advantage of inaccurate news reports to trade shares before their firm was acquired in 2011.
abstract: The S.E.C. says that three founders of a Minnesota-based software firm took advantage of inaccurate news reports to trade shares before their firm was acquired in 2011.

headline.main: Lawson Software Founders Settle Insider-Trading Charges
